Level1.name: BRING THE LIGHT
Level1.description: Repair a total of 2 generator(s).

Level1.name: GRUESOME
Level1.description: Hook 8 Survivor(s).

Level1.name: SAVIOR
Level1.description: Unhook 2 Survivor(s). Must unhook them safely.

Level1.name: SCRAP YARD
Level1.description: Damage 6 generator(s).

Level1.name: MECHANICAL OBSESSION
Level1.description: Damage the same generator 2 times.

Level1.name: BRUTAL BREAKER
Level1.description: Damage a generator or destroy a dropped pallet 5 time(s) while using the perk Brutal Strength.

Level1.name: HUNGRY JAWS
Level1.description: Catch a Survivor in a Bear Trap 2 time(s) as The Trapper.

Level1.name: PATCHED UP
Level1.description: Completely heal 4 health state(s) of any Survivor.

Level1.name: BLOODY REWARDS
Level1.description: Earn 50 000 Bloodpoints.

Level1.name: THE LAST PLACE YOU LOOK
Level1.description: Unlock 5 chest(s).

Level1.name: PLUNDER KING
Level1.description: Unlock 3 chest(s) while using the perk Plunderer's Instinct.

Level1.name: LIBERATOR
Level1.description: Unhook 5 Survivor(s). Must unhook them safely.

Level1.name: DARK TRIUMPH
Level1.description: Sacrifice 1 Survivor(s) during the Endgame Collapse.

Level1.name: SKILLED OPERATOR
Level1.description: Succeed at 20 Skill Check(s).

Level1.name: THIS IS HAPPENING
Level1.description: Get a Great result on 3 Skill Check(s) while using the perk This Is Not Happening.

Level1.name: CLAUDETTE'S DETERMINATION
Level1.description: As Claudette Morel, escape a trial.

Level1.name: AMATEUR ORNITHOLOGIST
Level1.description: Disturb 25 crows.

Level1.name: CRAFT TIME'S OVER
Level1.description: Cleanse 8 Totem(s).

Level1.name: REVERENT
Level1.description: Sacrifice 5 Survivor(s) to The Entity.

Level1.name: NONE SHALL SURVIVE
Level1.description: Kill all Survivors in a trial 1 time(s) by any means.

Level1.name: EMPATHIC
Level1.description: Completely heal 2 health state(s) of any Survivor while using the perk Empathy.
